Turn on your PC and play some of the biggest games of the year or try out franchises you’ve always been curious about.
**1 Month Free Trial included with all gaming PCs.**

cards.heading: The Best Gaming PC Monitoring App
cards.subheading: Manage performance, temperatures, and devices all from a single application. NZXT CAM is fast, efficient, and easy-to-use, allowing you to control every aspect of your computer.

product.name: Canvas 27 FHD 165Hz + Monitor Arm - Single
product.shortDescription: Bundle Canvas 27 FHD 165Hz and Monitor Arm
product.productOverview:
Bundle together and save on the Canvas 27F 165 and Monitor Arm.

**Canvas 27F 165**

Dive into immersive gaming and beyond with the Canvas 27F 165. Equipped with a 27-inch FHD IPS display, a lightning-fast 165 Hz refresh rate, and AMD FreeSync Premium technology, it delivers vibrant detail and ultra-smooth fluidity.
* Experience wide viewing angles and vivid, accurate colors on the 27-inch IPS display panel.
*  FHD resolution balances crisp graphics and optimal PC performance for sky-high framerates.
*  165 Hz refresh rate ensures silky-smooth gameplay and ultra-high framerates for quick, precise reactions.

**Monitor Arm**

A fully flexible monitor arm allows for simple cable management and a small spatial footprint, allowing users to free up desk space and make room for peripherals.

product.name: Relay Speakers + Relay Subwoofer + SwitchMix
product.shortDescription: 80 Watt Desktop Speakers, 140 Watt Subwoofer, and Headset Stand with Mixer
product.productOverview:
Bundle together and save 54% on Relay Speakers, Relay Subwoofer, and SwitchMix

**Relay Speakers**

Immerse yourself in in-game soundscapes with 80W power, silk dome tweeters, and glass fiber woofers, delivering natural highs and rich lows.
* Designed for close-up listening with a high dynamic range
* 80 watts of total power for room-filling sound

**Relay Subwoofer**

Enjoy deep, ground-shaking bass with 140 watts of power and a down-firing 6.5-inch driver. Precisely tune your audio with adjustable crossover and phase control knobs.
* Down-firing woofer and 140 watts of power for deep bass
* Adjustable crossover and phase control knobs

**SwitchMix**

Seamlessly switch between headset and speakers, balance in-game sound and chat with the studio-grade slider, and experience high-resolution audio.
* Instantly switch between headset and speaker audio
* Fade between in-game and voice chat audio
* 24-bit / 96 kHz DAC provides high-resolution audio

product.name: Relay Speakers + Relay Subwoofer + Relay Headset + SwitchMix
product.shortDescription: 80 Watt Desktop Speakers, 140 Watt Subwoofer, Hi-Res Certified Gaming Headset, and Headset Stand with Mixer
product.productOverview:
Bundle together and save 54% on Relay Speakers, Relay Subwoofer, Relay Headset, and SwitchMix

**Relay Speakers**

Immerse yourself in in-game soundscapes with 80W power, silk dome tweeters, and glass fiber woofers, delivering natural highs and rich lows.
* Designed for close-up listening with a high dynamic range
* 80 watts of total power for room-filling sound

**Relay Subwoofer**

Enjoy deep, ground-shaking bass with 140 watts of power and a down-firing 6.5-inch driver. Precisely tune your audio with adjustable crossover and phase control knobs.
* Down-firing woofer and 140 watts of power for deep bass
* Adjustable crossover and phase control knobs

**Relay Headset**

The Relay Headset offers heightened audio detail, an expanded frequency range, and a neutral sound profile—all in a comfy, lightweight frame.
* Hi-Res Audio delivers higher frequencies and enhanced detail
* Sonically accurate drivers provide a neutral sound profile

**SwitchMix**

Seamlessly switch between headset and speakers, balance in-game sound and chat with the studio-grade slider, and experience high-resolution audio.
* Instantly switch between headset and speaker audio
* Fade between in-game and voice chat audio
* 24-bit / 96 kHz DAC provides high-resolution audio
